review_blob: I tried all 3 beers on tap at the Wanaka Beerworks micro-brewery.  Tall Black poured beautifully.  A rich malty, sweet beer, full-bodied, flavours of chocolate, coffee, slightly smokey.  Appearance is a red ruby hue.  Smooth on the palate.

I tried the beers on tap at the Wanaka Beerworks micro-brewery.  I did the tour and tasted the 3 styles of beer on tap.   Cardrona gold was flavoured with sweet caramel maltiness, pleasant medium hop flavour, and smooth clean finish.

I went to the Wanaka Beerworks micro-brewery.  I did the tour which was fantastic, and tasted all three beers on tap.  As I am a pilsner fan Brewski was my favourite.  It had a clean appearance, fresh citrus aroma, full malty flavour, with a balanced hoppy finish.   Really enjoyed the fresh beer on tap!
